name: telemetry-frontend

scripts.fetch-openmct: if cd openmct; then git pull; else git clone https://github.com/nasa/openmct.git; fi
scripts.build-openmct: cd openmct && npm install && npm run build:prod && cd ..
scripts.get-openmct: npm run fetch-openmct && npm run build-openmct && npm run install-openmct
scripts.dev:clean: npm run get-openmct && npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm run lint && parcel serve src/index.html
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run get-openmct && parcel build src/index.html

author: Club de Investigaci√≥n Universitario de Desarrollo en Sistemas Espaciales
